name: Superstars V8: Next Challenge
description: A touring car style racing game with Real-world V8 cars from BMW, Jaguar, Cadillac, Porsche, Maserati and more . Based on the Italian Superstars by Milestone Studios who brought us SBK X and World Rally Championship. Utilizing the developer's in-house X Engine technology, The X Engine provides increased vehicle polygon count, faster loading times, better lighting, and more detailed environments.
